description: meta info used by the CP2K parser, all names are expected to start with x_cp2k_

metaInfos.description: Forces acting on the atoms in this Quickstep calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_atom_forces

metaInfos.description: The number of atomic kinds in the calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_atomic_kinds

metaInfos.description: The number of atoms in the calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_atoms

metaInfos.description: The name of the basis set file.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_basis_set_filename

metaInfos.description: The number of Cartesian basis functions.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_cartesian_basis_functions

metaInfos.description: The name of the coordinate file.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_coordinate_filename

metaInfos.description: Self-consistent electronic kinetic energy calculated with Quickstep
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_electronic_kinetic_energy

metaInfos.description: At each self-consistent field (SCF) iteration, change of total energy with respect to the previous SCF iteration.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_energy_change_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Total electronic energy calculated with XC_method during the self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_energy_total_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Value of the total energy (nuclei + electrons) calculated with Quickstep.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_energy_total

metaInfos.description: Exchange-correlation (XC) energy during the self-consistent field (SCF) iteration.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_energy_XC_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: The name of the geminal file.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_geminal_filename

metaInfos.description: The name of the CP2K input file that produced this calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_input_filename

metaInfos.description: Maximum angular momentum of the local part of the GTH pseudopotential.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_local_part_of_gth_pseudopotential

metaInfos.description: The coordinate components of an individual atom as a numpy array during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_coordinate_atom_float

metaInfos.description: The coordinate components of an individual atom  as a string during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_coordinate_atom_string

metaInfos.description: The atomic coordinates during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_coordinates

metaInfos.description: The force components of an individual atom during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_force_atom_float

metaInfos.description: The force components of an individual atom during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_force_atom_string

metaInfos.description: The atomic forces during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_forces

metaInfos.description: The number of a molecular dynamics step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_step_number

metaInfos.description: The simulation time of a molecular dynamics step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_step_time

metaInfos.description: The average temperature during MD step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_temperature_average

metaInfos.description: The instantaneous temperature during MD step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_temperature_instantaneous

metaInfos.description: The name of the MM potential file.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_mm_potential_filename

metaInfos.description: Maximum angular momentum of the non-local part of the GTH pseudopotential.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_non_local_part_of_gth_pseudopotential

metaInfos.description: Energy change for this optimization step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_energy_change

metaInfos.description: Whether there has been energy decrease. YES or NO.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_energy_decrease

metaInfos.description: Energy for this optimization step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_energy

metaInfos.description: Convergence criterium for the maximum force component of the current configuration.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_gradient_convergence_limit

metaInfos.description: Whether there is convergence in max gradient. YES or NO.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_max_gradient_convergence

metaInfos.description: Max gradient for this optimization step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_max_gradient

metaInfos.description: Maximum step size for this optimization step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_max_step_size

metaInfos.description: Optimization method for this step
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_method

metaInfos.description: Whether there is convergence in rms gradient. YES or NO.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_rms_gradient_convergence

metaInfos.description: RMS gradient for this optimization step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_rms_gradient

metaInfos.description: Whether there is convergence in rms step size. YES or NO.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_rms_step_size_convergence

metaInfos.description: RMS step size for this optimization step.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_rms_step_size

metaInfos.description: Convergence criterium for the maximum geometry change between the current and the last optimizer iteration.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_step_size_convergence_limit

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_step_size_convergence

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_used_time

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_primitive_cartesian_functions

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_quickstep_converged

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_run_start_date

metaInfos.description: The time when this run was started.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_run_start_time

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_dbcsr

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_filenames

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_geometry_optimization_energy_reevaluation

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_geometry_optimization_step

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_geometry_optimization

metaInfos.description: Contains the maximum angular momentum values used in the calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_maximum_angular_momentum

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_md_step

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_md

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the software version used for this run.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_programinformation

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_quickstep_calculation

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_startinformation

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_stress_tensor

metaInfos.description: The total number of different entities in the calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_section_total_numbers

metaInfos.description: The number of shell sets in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_stress_tensor_eigenvectors

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_stress_tensor_one_third_of_trace
